response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, but considering its relevance and utility to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. We understand that every transaction involves careful consideration, so please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
